memories.name: Learning Focus Q1
memories.episode_body: Working on understanding distributed systems patterns. Want to contribute more to payment service migration. Studying Kafka event streaming and PostgreSQL query optimization.

memories.name: Carol Kim - Associate Backend Engineer
memories.episode_body: Carol Kim is Associate Backend Engineer on Backend Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Alice Chen. Developing expertise in API development, database optimization, and microservices. 2 years backend engineering experience. Working on payment service migration.

memories.name: Database Optimization Work
memories.episode_body: Recently optimized slow queries in payment transaction table by adding composite index on (user_id, created_at). Reduced query time from 800ms to 45ms. Also implemented database connection pooling with SQLAlchemy to handle higher concurrency.

memories.name: API Development Contribution
memories.episode_body: Built refund API endpoint for payment service. Supports full and partial refunds with idempotency. Validates refund amount against original charge. Returns refund ID and status. Integrated with Stripe refund API.
